task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 8°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: The building is directly ahead but the current pitch (0°) may not capture its full height; rotating upward will reveal the roofline for accurate height estimation.
The upward pitch adjustment reveals the building's full vertical extent; using standard architectural proportions (8 floors × 3m/floor), the height is estimated as 24 meters.
